channel.title: Pioneers Conference in Vienna (October 29 & 30, right after Microconf)
channel.description:
Hi everyone! On October 29th and 30th, Pioneers conference is happening in Vienna: http://www.pioneers.io This is right after this year's Microconf Europe. The conference is about "Entrepreneurship and Innovative Technologies" and is quite famous in the Austrian startup scene and beyond.
I'm still on the fence whether to go. On one hand, it's certainly interesting; on the other hand it seems a bit over-hyped and not very relevant to micro-ISVs.
Anyone else going?

item.title: Pioneers Conference in Vienna (October 29 & 30, right after Microconf)
item.dc:creator: LTR
item.description:
Hi everyone!
On October 29th and 30th, Pioneers conference is happening in Vienna: http://www.pioneers.io
This is right after this year’s Microconf Europe. The conference is about “Entrepreneurship and Innovative Technologies” and is quite famous in the Austrian startup scene and beyond.

I’m still on the fence whether to go. On one hand, it’s certainly interesting; on the other hand it seems a bit over-hyped and not very relevant to micro-ISVs.

Anyone else going?

Read full topic
